title: True True
description:
A collection of more adult yuri stories originally published as doujins or in Comic Yuri Hime.

1. True True

2. Gravity
Saya and Miharu have been "adding" to their friendship, but when does it become too much?

3. Freeze Warning

4. Muteki no Maigo/The Invincible Lost Ones

5. Kimi Keiyuu, Haru Yuki/Through You, Towards Spring

6. Synchro/Oscilloscope

7. Hidden in Dusk
A girl looks through a window at how her neighbor girl makes out with other girls.

8. Sonna no mo Honto/That's True Too

9. Your Love
A girl worries that her girlfriend isn't really into her.

10. Snowflakes After
